name: Oxycodone tablets
description: You want some bomb ass oxycodone? Look no further than me, I got the real deal. This stuff is pure, unadulterated, and straight to the point. It is the purest stuff you'll find, and you can trust the source. The guys who made this are professionals. They use only the finest equipment to make sure it's pure and safe for consumption. Just one tablet is all you need to be feeling good. No headaches, no nausea, just pure bliss. Get yourself some now, and you won't regret it. Trust me, I'm on it right now as we speak. Peace out.

reviews.content: Provides temporary relief from the pain, numbing me from the horrors of hunting. This is the way to deal with the darkness.

reviews.author: Dr. Gregory House (ðŸ“›)
reviews.content: This, this is the real deal. You know i can't do one diagnosis without my oxycodone. Like that one time in that one episode where Dr. Cuddy took my oxycodone away and called me and addict.
